author: CBS News
title: Priyanka Chopra: Festival will pressure companies to fight virus
description: "One World: Together At Home" will broadcast live on Saturday, April 18.
content: Advocacy group Global Citizen and the World Health Organization announced a virtual music festival called "One World: Together At Home" that will celebrate health care workers and those on the front lines of the coronavirus crisis. The musical event, which is… [+5951 chars]
